entry.def: In geology, glaciation is the process by which the land is covered by glaciers. Glaciations are periods when this happens.

means.word_mean: 1. the condition of being covered with glaciers or masses of ice; the result of glacial action;

sentences.sentence: "Agassiz recognized marks of glaciation all over northern Europe"

means.word_mean: 2. the process of covering the earth with glaciers or masses of ice
